title: opinion on these profs
content:
mech statics - haridasa nayak
maths - komala b
chem - revanasiddapa

comments.body: Komala maam is really good. Reva is kinda mid but he'll give free marks
Bruh she was so strict in our time
she was strict in our class only if people continuously talk or make noise
Our class is the most notorious in our batch so makes sense

Komala is goated
Revu is well revu
Bro is mad chill tho, but he doesn't teach that great.

Komala ma'am average   
Revana sir is the best known for gone mad distributions for correct answers Amazing guy :) 

Haridasa sir depends if you pay attention he is decent i would say better than the others
